Text.text: Mylan had a global SAP implementation which included Master Data Management for the finance domains. I was responsible for all of the design, build, and support of the MDM solution. This included G/L Accounts, Cost Centers, Profit Centers, as well as the primary and secondary cost elements. The solution included a set of comprehensive workflow processes built with SAP CE/BPM and custom Java Webdynpro objects for the user interfaces. My responsibilities also included the facilitation of the integration development and testing - which included development in SAP PI and configuration of the ALE layer in SAP. Additionally, I was responsible for the development of the security and governance model, including the development of security roles in several SAP products.

On this project I was sub-contracted by the lead implementer and represented their company, however their entire team was based in Zurich so I was the only resource in the United States where much of the decision making (from the customer side) took place. Therefore, my role also incorporated a lot of customer relationship management and general project management activities.
